settings.content: This dashboard shows telemetry data for all my customers. It was created from this template.
settings.title: Telemetry for my customers
settings.subtitle: <APPINSIGHTSNAME>

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
traces
| distinct tostring(customDimensions.AadTenantId), tostring(customDimensions.EnvironmentName)
| summarize NumberOfEnvironments=count() by AadTenantId=customDimensions_AadTenantId

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
traces
| where message == "Page opened"
| summarize NumberOfTimesOpened=count() by PageId=tostring(customDimensions.PageId)

content.Query:
pageViews
| summarize NumberOfViews=count() by PageId=tostring(customDimensions.PageId), Page=tostring(customDimensions.PageName)
| order by NumberOfViews desc, PageId desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
traces
| where message contains "Job Queue Job completed"
| summarize JobsExecuted=count() by AadTenantId=tostring(customDimensions.AadTenantId),EnvironmentName=tostring(customDimensions.EnvironmentName)
| order by JobsExecuted desc

settings.content: This section shows telemetry about the customers' web services (OData, SOAP, etc.).
settings.title: Incoming requests (OData, SOAP, etc.)

settings.content: This section shows telemetry about customer customer environments' outgoing requests, including uses of the AL HttpClient object, as well as some platform-level requests.
settings.title: Outgoing requests

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
traces
| where operation_Name == "Long Running Operation (SQL Query)" 
| project timestamp, customDimensions.AadTenantId
| summarize Instances=count() by AadTenantId=tostring(customDimensions_AadTenantId)
